cs213.photoAlbum.simpleView
Class PhotosScreen

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      cs213.photoAlbum.simpleView.PhotosScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PhotosScreen
extends javax.swing.JFrame

This class represents the screen the user is going to see when an album is opened. It displays all photos in the album, allows editing, searching, creation of new photos and slideShow.

Author:
Roberto Ronderos Botero
See Also:
Serialized Form
